name: vscode-autohotkey-debug
description: Debugging support for AutoHotkey(includes H) v1 and v2
author: zero-plusplus <git@zero-plusplus.com>

program.description: Absolute path to a (ahk | ahk2 | ah2) file.

args.description: Arguments passed to the program to debug.

env.description: environment variables (the value null can be used to empty string a variable)

runtime.description: Assign `AutoHotkey.exe` to the extension `ahk` and `ahk2` and `ah2`. If you specify a relative path, the installation directory of AutoHotkey becomes the current directory. The extension `.exe` can be omitted.

runtime_v1.description: Assign `AutoHotkey.exe` to the extension `ahk`. If you specify a relative path, the installation directory of AutoHotkey becomes the current directory. The extension `.exe` can be omitted.

runtime_v2.description: Assign `AutoHotkey.exe` to the extension `ahk2` or `ah2`. If you specify a relative path, the installation directory of AutoHotkey becomes the current directory. The extension `.exe` can be omitted.

runtimeArgs.description:
In most cases you will not need to change this setting. Be aware that debugging may fail if you make changes.
Arguments to pass to AutoHotkey.exe. However, `/Debug` is ignored.

runtimeArgs_v1.description:
In most cases you will not need to change this setting. Be aware that debugging may fail if you make changes.
Argument to be passed to AutoHotkey.exe when the extension is `ahk`. However, `/Debug` is ignored.

runtimeArgs_v2.description:
In most cases you will not need to change this setting. Be aware that debugging may fail if you make changes.
Argument to be passed to AutoHotkey.exe when the extension is `ahk2` or `ah2`. However, `/Debug` is ignored.

port.description: You need to change this number if you want to debug multiple source code at the same time using different vscode instances. For example, 9001, 9002. You can also declare a range of port numbers that may be used by setting a string like "start-last". `start` and `last` are numbers. Also, it must be `start < last` For example, "9000-9010". By declaring it, you can suppress the message confirming the port usage.

maxChildren.description: Maximum number of child elements to retrieve

format.description: Content to be displayed. You can specify `MetaVariable` and AutoHotkey variables.

usePerfTips.description: If set to true, execute time will be displayed inline. You can change what is displayed by specifying a string. See the README for details.

useDebugDirective.description: You can send instructions to the debugger by embedding comments that follow specific rules in the source code. You can set the details by using the object.See the README for details. Note that enabling this feature will slow down the performance at debug launch.

openFileOnExit.description: The absolute path of the file to open when the debugger exits.  If you want to turn this feature off, set it to null or omit it.

configurationSnippets.label: AutoHotkey Debug
configurationSnippets.description: A new configuration for 'debugging' a user selected (ahk | ahk2 | ah2) file.
